projects.title: AI Chatbot Development
projects.description: Developed an LLM-based chatbot that answers questions from uploaded PDF documents using a RAG pipeline built with LangChain, FAISS, and Hugging Face Transformers. It handles text chunking, embeddings, and retrieval for context-aware responses.

projects.title: AI Assistant for Knowledge Retrieval (RAG Pipeline)
projects.description: Built an AI assistant capable of searching and generating answers from internal documents using LangChain and LlamaIndex. Designed an interactive Streamlit interface for demos.

projects.title: Text Summarization & Sentiment Analysis
projects.description: Created a summarization tool using Hugging Face Transformers to condense large documents and detect sentiment. Added keyword extraction and insight generation.

projects.title: Data Analytics & Automation
projects.description: Automated business data workflows using Python and Pandas. Designed reports, dashboards, and cleaned datasets for faster insights.

projects.title: Flask Web Portfolio with AI Assistant
projects.description: Developed a Flask-based portfolio integrated with a Groq-powered AI assistant capable of natural language interactions.
